definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: Patients retaining mandible or with skin flap repair had higher quality of life than the others.
sentences.chinese: 行下頜骨保留或皮瓣修復患者較同類病例生存質量高。

sentences.english: Objective Summing up the trentmeat experience of mandible fracture.
sentences.chinese: 目的總結下頜骨骨折的治療經驗。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the methods and experience of radical therapy of central arteriovenous malformation of the jaw.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討下頜骨動靜脈畸形的根治性治療方法和經驗。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect of using partially demineralized allogenic bone for the repair of bone defects.
sentences.chinese: 研究異體部分脫礦骨在修復下頜骨缺損中的作用。

sentences.english: Objective To detect the prominence of the use of pure titanium plate of internal immobilization in treating mandibular bone fractures.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討鈦板內固定在治療下頜骨骨折中的優異性。

sentences.english: Objective: To study the reopr of the large defect of mandible.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討下頜骨大型缺損的修復問題。

sentences.english: This article also has compared them with other nationalities to explore the trait of Hui's mandible.
sentences.chinese: 並與其它民族資料進行比較，探索回族下頜骨的特徵。

sentences.english: Your jawbone is the hardest bone in your body.
sentences.chinese: 你的下頜骨是身體裏最堅硬的骨頭。

sentences.english: The article reports 20 cases of recurrent ameloblastoma of the mandible.
sentences.chinese: 本文報告20例下頜骨複發性造釉細胞瘤。

sentences.english: The position relation between mandible and maxilla or cranioaural.
sentences.chinese: 下頜骨對上頜骨乃至顱骨的位置關係。

sentences.english: Objective To search for a direct observation method in blood supplies system of mandible.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索下頜骨血供系統的直觀觀測手段。

sentences.english: Microanatomy concerning with the operative approach in lateral fissure of cerebrum;
sentences.chinese: 目的探討不同手術進路治療下頜骨骨折的治療效果。

sentences.english: Completely transparent anatomical model of the mandible, clearly shows the arrangement of teeth.
sentences.chinese: 完全透明的下頜骨，清楚展示了牙齒的排列情況。

sentences.english: Objective To study apoptosis and cell proliferation in mandibular condylar cartilages of different gestational ages.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究胎兒下頜骨髁狀突軟骨細胞凋亡及增殖情況。

sentences.english: Result The RP model of mandible with dental arch is obtained.
sentences.chinese: 結果得到了下頜骨及下牙列的快速原型模型。

sentences.english: The teeth are embedded in the alveolar process of the maxilla and mandible.
sentences.chinese: 牙齒是嵌入在上頜骨和下頜骨的牙槽突。

definition: popliteal (anatomy)/hollow at the back of the knee
to form a scar/to form a scab
